properties.description: The hub is a building open to anyone. Every Wednesday between 12-2pm we offer a tasty hot meal for £1 and a Free hot drink. Additional Hot Drinks only 20p. We are open as the Warm Hub Lunch Club between November 2023 until end of March 2024 every week. This vital service is possible using the funding we have secured from The Jigsaw Homes Foundation this year. The Peoples Community Dukinfield Group volunteers work in partnership with Jigsaw Homes and other organisations and individuals to make vital services such as this a reality. #costoflivingcrisis #helpingothers #warmwelcomespaces #dukinfield

properties.description: This centre provides services primarily to South Asian women, who's first language is Bangla, Urdu, Punjabi, Hindi and those who speak English. Come and learn new skills, meet others from the community, have a natter over a warm cuppa. Free Wi-Fi. Place to prayer is available.
